hi,all

I checkout heritrix from cvs and use "maven dist" to bui=
ld , then
copy the heritrix-0.11.0.zip from distributions dir to another co=
mputer.

The computer is a windows 2003 box and I create a .bat file to lau=
ch
heritrix
and it works well. But when I start crawle a new site. It seems=
 heritrix
only
download the first page of that site, then the job finished.=


On my own computer,it also a windows 2003 os,I use WSAD to build heritrix=

and run
it in WSAD, it works fine.
